snippet.title: Recipe Tools
snippet.description: Tools for the recipe collector :-) RecipeFox: A addon to FireFox to grab recipes from the net (like the MasterCook addon in Internet Explorer) A recipe converter: It converts recipes from one format to another, and supports the following formats: - AccuC

snippet.title: Brewtarget
snippet.description: Brewtarget is free brewing software for Linux, Mac, and Windows. Compatible with BeerSmith. Generates instructions for you from the recipe and interactive mash designer! Hit all your targets with brewtarget.

snippet.title: v3c-launchpad
snippet.description: boostraps v3c recipe builds in launchpad

snippet.title: Gourmet
snippet.description: GNOME Recipe Manager w/ nutrition information and other useful plugins

snippet.title: The Modding Table
snippet.description: A software to craft easily your own Minecraft mod, without coding

snippet.title: ReciBase
snippet.description: Recibase: Where all of your recipes are in one place!

snippet.title: iEat
snippet.description: A clean and simple recipe database web application.
